name: SWAT Attack Terrorists
description:
SWAT Attack Terrorists is new fast pace 3d commando fps adventure. It is commando fighting in street war game; army commando will fight the enemy in the city now. The combat war is not on the frontline but the unique nature of this game is the realistic 3d city graphics.
FEATURES

– Intense game play through army combat missions
– Tactical Commando shooting experience killing troops of soldiers
– Ground to air attack targeting aircrafts
– 3D real looking warcraft environment
– Detailed GUI with smooth controls
